Question.Subject: How can I stop firefox tabs going to the end of the tab bar when I close one tab?
Question.Content:
Whenever I close one tab, it will go to the tab on the end of the tab bar. How can I just make it go to the next tab?
Thanks
Question.ChosenAnswer:
install a free add-on called Tab Mix Plus https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1122
Restart Firefox.
go to Tools->tab mix plus options
go to Events->Tab Closing
when closing current tab choose the "focus" setting from the drop down menu
see here http://www.upload3r.com/serve/010310/1267434524.png
if that doesn't fix it, you may have a conflict from another extension or toolbar
